name: Sarah Johnson
tagline: DevinCook at en.wikipedia, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
headerContent:
# This is your future campaign donation portal.

1. Scroll down to [configure](/#donation-config) this page for your campaign - replace the above image with your logo, this text with your call to action (or your entire policy platform if you want), and add other customization options.

2. Create an account with just an FED ID and a Stripe account with an organization name matching your FEC committee name.

3. Once we verify your information (give us a day or two), deploy your portal and start taking donations. Configure a custom domain if you want, or embed on your campaign website.

5. Add additional portals, reporting and analytics tools, email campaigns, and voter registration lookup to build out your campaign tech stack.

6. Need more customization? Fork our open-source React app and self host.
metaDescription: Join Sarah Johnson"s fight for working families - donate today
customFooterText: Join our grassroots movement to bring real change to Washington. Every dollar helps us reach more voters and build the coalition we need to win.
donationSuccessMessage: Thank you for standing with Sarah! Together, we are building a campaign that puts working families first.
